statements: SELECT * FROM CourseContent WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_title, video_url FROM CourseContent WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT course_title, article_content FROM CourseContent WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CourseContent WHERE course_title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT course_id, course_title, exercise_questions FROM CourseContent WHERE course_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM CourseContent WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_title, video_url FROM CourseContent WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CourseContent WHERE course_title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT course_title, video_url, article_content FROM CourseContent WHERE course_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT course_title, exercise_questions FROM CourseContent WHERE LENGTH(exercise_questions) > 100 AND course_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT video_title, duration FROM videos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT video_title, duration FROM videos ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT content_title, published_date FROM course_content WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM course_content WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT video_title, duration FROM videos ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM course_content WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM videos WHERE video_id = 5;
SELECT content_title, author FROM course_content WHERE author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT video_id, video_title FROM videos WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT article_title, published_date FROM articles WHERE published_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT exercise_name, difficulty_level FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY exercise_name DESC;
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM videos WHERE video_title LIKE '%tutorial%'
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT video_title, video_description FROM videos WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT article_title, published_date FROM articles ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT exercise_name, difficulty_level FROM exercises WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC;
SELECT article_title, article_content, author_id FROM articles WHERE author_id = 'a12b3456-cd78-9e01-f234-567890abde12';
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT title, description FROM articles;
SELECT content_id, type FROM course_content;
SELECT author, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT question, choices FROM exercises WHERE exercise_id = 3;
SELECT title, description FROM videos WHERE duration > 10
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe'
SELECT content_id, type FROM course_content WHERE type='video'
SELECT title, author, content FROM articles INNER JOIN course_content ON articles.article_id = course_content.content_id
SELECT question, choices FROM exercises WHERE correct_answer=1
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT title, length_minutes FROM videos ORDER BY length_minutes DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, published_date FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT exercise_id, title, explanation FROM exercises WHERE question LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE length_minutes > 30 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, length_minutes FROM videos WHERE video_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE published_date >= '2021-01-01' AND author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY published_date ASC;
SELECT username, date_joined FROM users WHERE date_joined < '2021-06-01' AND username ILIKE 'a%';
